data.name: T-shirt with slippers design
data.description: Nox paddle sports shirt for men with short sleeves and standard cut.In olive green color with black logo and reflective detail on the back.Incorporates NOX Balance Fresh technology for maximum comfort in the game.Content: Polyester 92% - Elastane 8%

data.name: Sweatshirt with hoodie
data.description: A classic hoodie sweatshirt that's perfect for everyday wear. Made from soft, comfortable cotton, this hoodie is perfect for lounging around the house or running errands. The hoodie features a drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket for added warmth and storage. Available in a variety of colors and sizes.

data.name: Jeans
data.description: The 501 Original Fit jeans are a classic, timeless style that's perfect for every occasion. Made from durable denim, these jeans are comfortable and stylish. The 501 Original Fit jeans feature a straight leg, button fly, and five-pocket styling. Available in a variety of colors and sizes.

data.name: Dress
data.description: A midi-length dress with a pleated skirt that's perfect for a special occasion. Made from a comfortable, flowy fabric, this dress is perfect for any event. The dress features a v-neckline, long sleeves, and a button-up closure. Available in a variety of colors and sizes.

data.name: Shoes
data.description: A classic, timeless sneaker that's perfect for everyday wear. Made from durable leather, these sneakers are comfortable and stylish. The Air Force 1 Low sneakers feature a white leather upper, a black Swoosh, and a white midsole. Available in a variety of sizes.

data.name: Tank top
data.description: A stylish and comfortable tank top that's perfect for everyday wear. Made from soft, breathable cotton, this tank top is perfect for lounging around the house or running errands. The tank top features a relaxed fit

data.name: Floral print leggings
data.description: Comfy and stylish, these high-waisted leggings feature an all-over floral print.

data.name: Denim jacket
data.description: A timeless classic, this denim jacket is perfect for layering over any outfit.

data.name: Straw hat
data.description: Keep cool and stylish with this wide-brimmed straw hat.

data.name: Sunglasses
data.description: These classic aviator sunglasses are always a good choice.

data.name: Sneakers
data.description: Comfortable and stylish, these sneakers are perfect for everyday wear.

data.name: Tote bag
data.description: A versatile tote bag that's perfect for carrying all your essentials.

data.name: Belt
data.description: A classic leather belt that's perfect for everyday wear. Made from durable leather, this belt is both stylish and functional. The belt features a classic buckle closure and a range of size adjustments. Available in a variety of colors.

data.name: Watch
data.description: A smart and stylish smartwatch that's perfect for everyday use. This Apple Watch features a durable stainless steel case, a sleek midnight sport band, and a variety of fitness and health tracking features. Available in a variety of sizes and band colors.

data.name: Hat
data.description: A classic fedora hat that's perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Made from durable felt, this hat is both stylish and comfortable. The fedora features a pinched crown, a wide brim, and a satin ribbon band. Available in a variety of colors.

data.name: Jewelry
data.description: A classic and timeless sterling silver chain necklace that's perfect for any occasion. This necklace features a modern design and a comfortable length. Available in a variety of styles and lengths.

data.name: Perfume
data.description: A classic and masculine fragrance that's perfect for everyday wear. This eau de parfum features notes of bergamot, lavender, and cedarwood. Available in a variety of sizes.
